Pathetic!\""},{"lineNumber":219069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ、急に喋りだしたと思ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, suddenly started talking and looks so happy!\""},{"lineNumber":219070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　めっちゃ嬉しそう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You look really happy!\""},{"lineNumber":219071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、とにかく、誰かに話を――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-anyway, I have to tell someone—\""},{"lineNumber":219072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、貴方は乱義様の妹君の……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Wait, you are Lady Rangy’s younger sister...!\""},{"lineNumber":219073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、す、すみません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, s-sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":219074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは何が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is happening here...\""},{"lineNumber":219075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well...\""},{"lineNumber":219076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鬼です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's the Oni!\""},{"lineNumber":219077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「突然前触れもなく鬼の集団が織田城に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suddenly, without warning, a group of Oni appeared at Oda Castle...\""},{"lineNumber":219078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目下、大勢の兵達で抗戦しておりますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Currently, many soldiers are fighting against them,\""},{"lineNumber":219079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らどこかから火の手を上げたようで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"but it seems they started fires somewhere...\""},

{"lineNumber":219080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「乱義は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What about Rangy?\""},

{"lineNumber":219081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、すみません詳しいことは私には……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, sorry, I don't know the details...\""},

{"lineNumber":219082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですがおそらく今も城内で戦っておられるかと","translatedEnglishLine":"However, I guess he is probably still fighting inside the castle."},

{"lineNumber":219083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「た、大変だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-This is bad!\""},

{"lineNumber":219084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー？　助けに行くってのかよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? You're going to go help them?\""},{"lineNumber":219086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーあー、いらねーいらねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nah nah, no need, no need.\""},{"lineNumber":219087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義ならテメーでテメーのケツ拭けんだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"If it's Rangy, he can take care of himself."},{"lineNumber":219088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　放っときゃいいんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just leave him alone.\""},{"lineNumber":219089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いらねーだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No need."},{"lineNumber":219090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んな簡単にくたばるタマかよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you think he’d die that easily?\""},

{"lineNumber":219092,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺もう三時間は必要と見た","translatedEnglishLine":"I figure it'll take at least three more hours.\""},{"lineNumber":219093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はー？　なんで俺様がそんなこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Why should I do that?\""},{"lineNumber":219094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「放っとけ放っとけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just leave it, leave it,\""},{"lineNumber":219095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分の国のことなんだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s your own country’s problem,"},{"lineNumber":219096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義がなんとかすんだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangy will handle it.\""},{"lineNumber":219097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ？　うっせーなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Shut up already.\""},{"lineNumber":219099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「援軍も救助も必要ねーってんだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No reinforcements or rescue are needed, right?\""},{"lineNumber":219100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219101,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはザンスをジッと見つめてみた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You looked intently at Zansu."},{"lineNumber":219102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんだよ？　何見てんだよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? What are you looking at?\""},{"lineNumber":219103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、あんだよ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I mean, what do you want!?\""},{"lineNumber":219105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言いてーことあんなら言いやがれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you have something to say, just say it!\""},{"lineNumber":219106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬっ、ぐっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ngh, ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":219108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい、いいから行くわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright, come on, let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":219109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いででで！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch ouch ouch!\""},{"lineNumber":219110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　志津香！　耳引っ張んじゃねーよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka! Don’t pull my ear!\""},{"lineNumber":219111,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香がザンスの耳を引っ張りながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka pulled on Zansu’s ear as she said,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜メラメラ、メラメラ＞
ただし燃えていた。
「って、えーーーーーーー！？！？！？」
「ななな、なんでなんでなんで！？
なんで織田城メラメラ燃えてるわけ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why is Oda Castle blazing up like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、織田城っていつもこんな感じ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, is Oda Castle always like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなわけあるか！」
「くっ……くくく……」
「ぎゃはははははは！
こりゃあなんだー、いったい！？
えー！？」
「がははは！　あの野郎！
ついにくたばりやがったか！」
「あ、下克上って奴か！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, is this a case of insubordination!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下に裏切られて焼き討ちか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Betrayed by his subordinates and burned down!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは！　情けねーなー！」
「うわっ、急に喋りだしたと思ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, suddenly started talking and looks so happy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: めっちゃ嬉しそう！」
「と、とにかく、誰かに話を――」
「なっ、貴方は乱義様の妹君の……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait, you are Lady Rangy’s younger sister...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、す、すみません！
これは何が……」
「そ、それが……
鬼です！」
「突然前触れもなく鬼の集団が織田城に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Suddenly, without warning, a group of Oni appeared at Oda Castle..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目下、大勢の兵達で抗戦しておりますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Currently, many soldiers are fighting against them,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らどこかから火の手を上げたようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but it seems they started fires somewhere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義は？」
「うっ、すみません詳しいことは私には……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, sorry, I don't know the details..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですがおそらく今も城内で戦っておられるかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I guess he is probably still fighting inside the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「た、大変だ！」
「あー？　助けに行くってのかよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You're going to go help them?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーあー、いらねーいらねー。
乱義ならテメーでテメーのケツ拭けんだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's Rangy, he can take care of himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放っときゃいいんだよ」
「いらねーだろ。
んな簡単にくたばるタマかよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you think he’d die that easily?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それよりいつ城が焼け落ちるか賭けようぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather, let's bet on when the castle will burn down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もう三時間は必要と見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I figure it'll take at least three more hours."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー？　なんで俺様がそんなこと」
「放っとけ放っとけ、
自分の国のことなんだ、
乱義がなんとかすんだろ
「ああ？　うっせーなー」
「援軍も救助も必要ねーってんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No reinforcements or rescue are needed, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはザンスをジッと見つめてみた。
「あんだよ？　何見てんだよ？」
「だから、あんだよ！？
言いてーことあんなら言いやがれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have something to say, just say it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬっ、ぐっ……」
「はいはい、いいから行くわよ」
「いででで！
志津香！　耳引っ張んじゃねーよ！」
志津香がザンスの耳を引っ張りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka pulled on Zansu’s ear as she said,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

んな簡単にくたばるタマかよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you think he’d die that easily?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それよりいつ城が焼け落ちるか賭けようぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather, let's bet on when the castle will burn down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もう三時間は必要と見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I figure it'll take at least three more hours."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー？　なんで俺様がそんなこと」
「放っとけ放っとけ、
自分の国のことなんだ、
乱義がなんとかすんだろ
「ああ？　うっせーなー」
「援軍も救助も必要ねーってんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No reinforcements or rescue are needed, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはザンスをジッと見つめてみた。
「あんだよ？　何見てんだよ？」
「だから、あんだよ！？
言いてーことあんなら言いやがれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have something to say, just say it!"

「いででで！
志津香！　耳引っ張んじゃねーよ！」
志津香がザンスの耳を引っ張りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka pulled on Zansu’s ear as she said,
